website_summaries.verdict: For places where kids need closed toes, but still want the freedom of dry feet in outdoor activities, this is a good bet.
pros: Toes protected on the fronts of these shoes
Great for lots of different outdoor activities
Ideal for places that require covered toes
No ties allows kids to get them on and off quickly by themselves
cons: The entry for the foot on these can be hard for kids with higher arches
The toes can also get a little sweaty in hot weather

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I wear a women's 7 and tend to buy kids shoes as I have wide feet. over a year later and these are my go to shoe for long walks and hikes. My feet feel comfortable and they don't feel like they are getting blistered. I originally bought these for my honeymoon over a year ago and I wore them every day. I am hooked on Keen for life. After a year of wear I don't even feel like I have to replace them at all. I was worried about the bungee cord that you pull on to tighten the shoe, but there are no signs of wear on that either.
customer_reviews.author: Yellieray

customer_reviews.title: Great kid shoes for this adult
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfortable. Keen youth shoes are usually true to size and these are no exception. (I’m an adult but these fit me better than my grownup size!)The colors are bright and nice. They are cool for summer wear daily as well as while swimming in the lake or beach. This is my 3rd purchase of this shoe style over the years, so needless to say I’m a fan!
customer_reviews.author: Nannynannybooboo

customer_reviews.title: Cute, durable and fashionable
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love, love, love these shoes! They are so stinkin' cute! They fit perfectly, and my 3 year daughter can easily put them on and take them off. She is very rough on shoes, but these (and all other Keens she has worn in the past) are holding up, especially on that toe!. She wears these with and without socks...both ways are cute. Even when she goes sock less, her feet don't stink. I do not have a single negative thing to say about these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Britany

customer_reviews.title: More stylish than Newports but same quality!
customer_reviews.text: We have bought the Newport ones for my daughter ever year. I decided to go with these because she liked the design better. Her daycare only allows closed toed shoes for the summer and these are perfect for that! She says they are comfy and they match most of her outfits. They seem lighter than the newports and dry fast! My only concern upon initial inspection is that Velcro is thinner so I hope it will hold up over the summer like the Newports did. I also feel like the smaller narrow straps allow less rocks and Mulch to get in which we had a problem with in the past. Fingers crossed but we love the design
customer_reviews.author: Rose S

customer_reviews.title: Found my favorite walking shoe on earth. Hand in glove.
customer_reviews.text: I asked all my friends to recommend the best walking shoe to me. The keen whisper was one of the many. After trying them all, I decided it was my favorite shoe on earth. Fits like a glove. I love the supportive sole, the look, the feel inside, the color, everything. So happy to have found the perfect hiking/walking shoe. Since I wear a kid size 5, I was able to pay half price, and got a pair for my older my daughters too. I actually prefer the Keen kid shoe vs the adult one. My 12 year old daughter who wears the same size as me, also thinks they are the best walking shoe ever. So, thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Polyphony

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we are looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a big fan of Newport due too their bulk and weight but I want a nice pair of waterproof shoes for our trip to Singapore where it's hot and humid (ventilation is important) and there will be some sort of water play to cool down (waterproof or fast drying). And there will be a lot of walking (lightweight with good support). This pair of shoes seems to have all the attributes we are looking for. We'll see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Janice QC

customer_reviews.title: Best summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: We love Keens! I've been buying them for my kids since my oldest, almost 9, started walking. We had the velcro version of Raya and my daughter (and I) loved it so much we reordered the same pattern for her for this summer. Perfect for the beach and all outdoor activities and such a comfort knowing her feet/toes are protected. I hope she continues to like wearing keens for a while yet because they are the best summer shoe!
customer_reviews.author: slamb05

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer sandal!
customer_reviews.text: So I'd just gotten a cheap version of these shoes and our dog ate them. I found these and was hoping these would fit my daughter's super skinny feet. Slip-on's are usually a no for her. But, HURAY! These are absolutely perfect. The bungee tightens up great, and the extra tucks in easily. She absolutely loves the colors, the fit, the comfort. They are just perfect for summer. She's a rough and tumble kiddo who also loves bright colors. The price can't be beat either. Super happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff fussner

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase keen's for my grandkids every year for the summer months. They are comfortable and can be worn with many different outfits. I feel they have a lot more support than flip flops. They run true to size. If my grandkids are in between sizes like a 10-1/2, I would order a size 11. This year my granddaughter wears a size 11 and that's what I ordered her and they fit well. My grandson is a size 9 and that's what I ordered him and they fit well too. So overall, I am very satisfied with my keen's purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Mamaw Williams

customer_reviews.title: Tough and durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought theses sport sandals for my 4 year old who is very rough on shoes. Last year I bought a similar looking shoe from Target and it lasted less than 2 weeks. I bought them a half size bigger than she is right now because she has grown out of shoes very quickly in the past. She loves these sandals and they have held up so far. We have already been camping and she burred them in the mud and wore them tubing down a river. I would definitely would buy these shoes again. In fact I want a pair.
customer_reviews.author: AnnD

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals and a good price
customer_reviews.text: My active daughter loves her new Keens and they seem to be holding up well. I like the multicolor pattern, it matches most of her clothes. She had no problem taking them on and off, and like all Keens they go in and out of the water no problem. Perfect summer shoes, and I got them at a great price! (Helpful since she'll only be able to wear them this summer/fall before she grows out of them).
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix Lawhon

customer_reviews.title: Cute and quality
customer_reviews.text: These little shoes are very cute. I have previously purchased H2 sandals. These have more and thinner straps than the H2 but also seem slightly more narrow. They are very similar to the H2 but I really like the color of these. In the toddler 9 the whisper has a Velcro strap closure and also a bungee strap with slide. The smaller H2 ones do not have an adjustable bungee with slide. My little one likes these.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for the active summer kiddo!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of these sandals I have bought for my kids. Size runs as expected, but a little on the wide side. These are great for outdoorsy kids in the warmer months. For activities that I would normally force my kids to wear sneakers I now let them wear these sandals in the summer and spring and early fall. Let's their feet breath and keep cool but protects the toes. I love them. My 2.5 year old can put them on herself and her feet do not stink after wearing them like they do with the knock off brands. These are worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Working mom of 4 who LOVES Amazon

customer_reviews.title: My daughter had pink ones just like these for two years in size 2 and had ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money! My daughter had pink ones just like these for two years in size 2 and had to get new ones because they were too small, but they held up to everyday wear (even in the winter in the South!) Just got these in size 5 (I think she is really a 4.5) because she hates tight shoes and her tennis shoes in size 5 are good, but these are just a tad big (she tightens them so I think it's fine.) Love that they cover her toe, stay on for running, walking, playgrounds, scooters, etc. They can get wet and don't get smelly-they can handle very active play!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for my 6.5 year old!
customer_reviews.text: My 6.5 yo daughter loves her new shoes! She picked them out on Amazon and jumped for joy when they were delivered! I ordered a size 1 but normally she wears a size 12.5 13 sneaker and they fit with room to grow this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Mlb925

customer_reviews.title: The gold standard in athletic sandals (function over form)
customer_reviews.text: These can handle just about anything from walking to climbing. 13,000' peak? No problem unless you need ankle support (if you have a backpack, etc and the terrain is very rough). They fit feet of medium width perfectly. They will not give you a blister even on a long hike. They grip like hiking boots and dry quickly. There is no better athletic sandal for heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Harris Wood

customer_reviews.title: sandals that are made for play and protection
customer_reviews.text: YES! A pair of sandals that can get wet, stay securely on my daughter's feet, and protect her toes! And that she and I agree on! I'm a big fan of these for myself and was happy to have found these for my daughter. The colors are adorable for spring/summer!
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great summer sandals
customer_reviews.text: Love keen's! I bought them in 2 sizes for my daughter and she loves them so much we're keeping both! Great fit and quality. We like the lining so they are soft on bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Maker

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed at the material quality
customer_reviews.text: I have used keen for 10 years. I have had no problem at all till now. The fabric is ripping. Amazon doesn’t even refund and the vender doesn’t respond.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Myers

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has an extremely difficult foot to fit, or rather she is extremely picky about how shoes feel on her feet. We haven't had a pair of shoes in years that she loves like these. She hated chacos, tevas, amd birks...but wants to wear these everyday. We will have one or two pairs of KEENS at all times now! Great shoe and has held up to summer play extremely well! True to size and perfect if foot is on the wide side!
customer_reviews.author: texasgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe, will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in a size 3 for my 7yo daughter to wear daily to summer camp. She has worn them 4 days now and she reports they are comfortable and that she likes them. Pink doesn't match every outfit but it works for camp. I make a point to wipe them down every evening as I had read in a review that they smelled. I haven't noticed any odor beyond a faint smell that I feel is expected for a kid's shoe of this type. I am considering buying another pair to match her more primary colored clothes.
customer_reviews.author: KaeBoo

customer_reviews.title: Keen sandals are a super value because they last and last
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE Keen sandals. Bought this same pair in a smaller size for my granddaughter last year. She loved them so much, I had to find the exact style and color this year. Keen makes very durable sandals for the whole family and they hold up so well, some I have purchased have been passed down to 4 different grandchildren and still look good.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi400

customer_reviews.title: Love these Keens!
customer_reviews.text: These definitely run very large- our daughter wears a size 3 but we got these in a size 2 after past experience and she has PLENTY of room to grow. She loves these Keens and doesn't want to wear any other summer water sandals!
customer_reviews.author: k-girl

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for a kid’s shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My great niece loves these shoes. She wears them almost every day! The colors are great and go with almost everything. They are supportive and durable. She says they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anne Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Too bad she'll outgrow them before she wears them out!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent summer shoe! It's perfect for running, splashing, hiking, camping, and eliminates the need for 5 different kinds of shoes. It's looks great with bright colors and speed laces. A great shoe for the amusement park, water park, state park, bike path, hiking trail, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for a kid.
customer_reviews.text: These hold up great and the kid seems comfortable in them.
customer_reviews.author: Carlson1038

customer_reviews.title: and she says these are the most comfortable ones. She would've liked another color better
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 3 different sandals for my 8-year old girl, and she says these are the most comfortable ones. She would've liked another color better, but these were the best fit. Since she has a long a skinny foot, we were unable to tighten the the Keen Seacamp ll and Merell Hydro hiker sandals well enough for her.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Best summer shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: My 6yr old says that they are super smooshy, don't pinch her toes, and she loves the colors. I like how easy they are to put on. Not too wide or narrow, I'd buy them again and I'm looking for an adult version.
customer_reviews.author: FranG

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute BUT not for narrow feet
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute. BUT they run large around the ankle to where I couldn't get them tight enough so they wouldn't slip on her heel. They ended up leaving marks on the top of her feet (probably since they were too loose) after a few minutes of trying them on in the house. If you kids have wide or chunky feet these would probably work better. My daughter has narrow feet. I'll be returning these. Disappointed but we have a pair of the Newports that fit her perfect and leave no marks on her feet! We love keens in our house!
customer_reviews.author: nicknick0106

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Keens by far
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the colors and price. My child gets a pair of Keens every year and this is her favorite pair by far. I am sure that it is the color that she likes.
customer_reviews.author: Wmsnclrk

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: I love buying big kids keens.i get the same product with a bonus heel stability for a less expensive price !
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids and they wash easily!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these! My three year old loves them too! Never has had sore feet or anything! We bought these right before a family trip to a theme park so she had to do a lot of walking and we did water rides and regular rides and the issues were incredible! We also have horses and she loves to come and help so you can imagine how dirty the shoes get and we can just hose them off they look brand new again ! Well done Keen!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Great sandals for active girls! Money well spent
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals they fit are comfortable and really are holding up after a few weeks of outdoor camp! Still look like new. I am thrilled and so is my daughter
customer_reviews.author: BackPackKing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, my daughter loves them, they have withstand abuse like a champion. Color still holding, nothing is falling apart. We got this shoes for our daughter several months ago, heavy use and still looking great.
customer_reviews.author: Karlajustme

customer_reviews.title: Love KEEN sandals
customer_reviews.text: Have always loved these KEEN sandals. My older boys have them, too! They are great for the summer because you can wear them to the beach or any water venue, and still have great support. The sandals are also washable in the washing machine. When it gets cold, simply wear a pair of socks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ripped apart after only three weeks.
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed. My daughter has only had these three weeks and the grip piece at the end of the Velcro ripped off already. This means she can't lift the Velcro any more to get her shoes off. This shouldn't happen, especially after only three weeks. The other shoe is already ripping the same the same way. I've included pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all terrain shoe
customer_reviews.text: Daughter uses these to fish swim in the river and go out to eat. All around great show she loves them. Only dislike is the Velcro strap on top I don’t feel that it’s needed and her being 3 she wants to pull the strap all the way out when putting them on by herself
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 6 year old is never happy with her shoes
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old is never happy with her shoes, but these have been a perfect fit. She says "if you step in water, you just shake your foot, and BOOM, it's dry." She has been wearing them at summer camp, with hiking and outdoor activities. Much safer than flip flops or open toe sandals. For us it is worth the cost, to have something she'll wear consistently. So far (2 weeks of heavy outdoor play) they have held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Cute and durable
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Keen's I've bought for my daughter, since she outgrew the first. These shoes hold up extremely well. She's worn them in muddy creeks and sandy beaches and they clean up nicely. Like most of her shoes, I buy them slightly larger than her size and she was able to wear her previous pair for two years. My daughter really loves the color of the shoes and can wear them with just about anything. I can't say enough good things about Keen shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G

customer_reviews.title: Cute, quality sandal but sizing off
customer_reviews.text: Cute and appear good quality but too large. Tough to figure out sizing with Keen. These run much longer than the Newports. Newport’s perfect length but narrow opening so hard to get on if your child has even slightly “chubby” feet.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Good, reliable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Every summer I purchase KEEN sandals for my daughter to wear to summer camp. I love that they're waterproof, and sturdy and supportive enough for her to run around in. Very durable, too. She didn't even come close to wearing them out so I'll try to pass them along as a hand-me-down!
customer_reviews.author: trp9004

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Colourful. We haven't had them long but so far no complaints. My daughter likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: My 5-year-old daughter loves these shoes, on whom the size 11s fit perfectly. The colors lend themselves nicely to use with virtually any outfit (my daughter is a fashionista in the making), and the fit seems comfortable for her (she hasn't complained of any discomfort yet). I am very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mum

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandals. Order a size down.
customer_reviews.text: I learned at a brick and mortar store that keen kids tend to run large. (the opposite is true for adults) My DD is moving into a little kids 13 so I ordered a 12 and they fit and look great with room to grow. She loves them.
customer_reviews.author: SaraJ

customer_reviews.title: Best sandals I've every bought for my girls
customer_reviews.text: Best sandals I've every bought for my girls. These held up through a whole summer of adventure and they'd wear them again next year if they still fit. Normally will go though 2 Paris off cheaper sandals a season. Worth the extra money for a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: This sandal is sturdy, cool, supportive,and comfortable. Great for summer campers.
customer_reviews.author: LA Creole

customer_reviews.title: Very snug
customer_reviews.text: The fit is very snug on my granddaughter's feet. It could be because she's used to wearing Crocs. Product was returned.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Sandals
customer_reviews.text: My almost three year old granddaughter loves these sandals. They stay on her feet and stand up to the wear and tear of outdoor play. They are cute and go with almost everything.
customer_reviews.author: Alexaaa

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and comfortable-like sneaker sandals
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear an adult women's size 6 but ordered these kids ones in size 4. They fit perfectly! Adorable colors, very comfortable and a lot cheaper than the adult version. Can't beat that!!
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: We travel full time, meaning tons of hiking and outdoor activities. My daughter loved these and they’ve held up great. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: The Wanderpreneurs

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend these shoes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my daughter last week. She wears them almost every day at the summer camp,goes with them at the pool ... until now no blisters. Good quality good fit! Happy to find them!
customer_reviews.author: G and S

customer_reviews.title: Worlds best shoes for kids!
customer_reviews.text: HANDS DOWN BEST SHOES FOR KIDS! We recently went on a 2 week cross country roadtrip and these babies went through everything! GREAT for rock climbing and wading through a rocky creek. They dry quickly compared to sneakers, and NEVER made her feet smell like cheap counterparts! I will never go to another shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love these shoes! As usual, Keen has produced a comfortable, versatile and durable shoe, this time with the added bonus of a super-cute pattern. These go with just about anything in my daughter's drawers and, since they're Keens, they can go just about anywhere. Highly recommend this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: georgiaelk

customer_reviews.title: nothing to talk about... Keen sandals are the best out there
customer_reviews.text: They are so sturdy and last forever. Kids can run and jump in comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Very good sandals
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. She says they're comfy and that her feet are not hot. I think they look cute, and the colors go well with everything. They protect her toes, which is important. We've had Keens before and they last a long, long time.
customer_reviews.author: K. A. Pouncey

customer_reviews.title: Versatile and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: We love the Keen brand! My 8 yo would wear Keen sandals all year round if I let her (and she is picky!). This is our first pair of "Whisper". These are so comfy, light weight and fashionable. She wears them with a dress to church or to hike and play in the creek.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with Keen Whisper Sandal
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with Keen Whisper Sandal...it was the first Keen shoe I've bought for my 4 year old granddaughter and she really liked these shoes and wore them a lot. I was very pleased with quality, attention to detail, and the way it fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mary J.

customer_reviews.title: They slip on easily, can get wet and still be worn
customer_reviews.text: ah, Keens -- our daughter loves these shoes and wears them all summer long. They slip on easily, can get wet and still be worn, hold up to lots of abuse. We buy another pair in the next size up pretty much every year. They're her favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Max student

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is cute and comfortable! Love that they can be washed!
customer_reviews.author: Josie P

customer_reviews.title: Great all purpose shoe.
customer_reviews.text: We love Keen's and this pair is no exception. My daughter can wear these all day. We hike, walk, play and go to the beach in these. They are a great all around shoe when you don't want to haul multiple pairs with you. They also protect her toes so she doesn't stub them when she's running around.
customer_reviews.author: L. Elder

customer_reviews.title: fit any type foot - great for my narrow footed daughter that complains about all shoes.
customer_reviews.text: great shoes - my narrow footed daughter can tighten these to her content. When they got all muddy, i pounded them off and dropped them in my washing machine. they are as good as new. These are shoes that don't wear out, they get passed down.
customer_reviews.author: jetladuke

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BUY!! stops heels from slipping and more...
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals. best part is the way they adjust around the heel. My 8 year old has trouble with OTHER shoes and having the heel slip. THE KEEN WHISPER tightens a "cinch" bungy cord around the heel providing infinte ability to loosen or tighten. I am buying a 2nd pair.
customer_reviews.author: Paul K

customer_reviews.title: They fit just like we thought and thanks to the elastic straps we ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my niece for our summer camping and hiking trips. They fit just like we thought and thanks to the elastic straps we should be able to get 2 years out of them. Very comfortable and she has not once complained about her feet hurting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with Keens!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the third pair of Keens I have owned. They hold up amazing as I trek through the desert sand, into streams, and over boulders. I love the traction, the toe protection and the ventilation. A go-to show for everyone in my family.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron B Hutchings

customer_reviews.title: ... wearing them but my granddaughter seems to be quite happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I can't say "loved it" 5 stars because I'm not wearing them but my granddaughter seems to be quite happy with them. 6 yrs. old and if the smallest thing bothers her regarding her clothing, socks, shoes, etc, she complains!!! She likes the color, they are easy to put on even with overlap of the strap and they are easy to clean since she wears them to camp and the do come home pretty dusty some days.
customer_reviews.author: K Morris

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely purchase these again
customer_reviews.text: These are great for water and land. We take these any time we go to water parks. So perfect! They aren't made cheaply which means they aren't made of lightweight foam. There's a bit of weight to them not super heavy my 4 year old doesn't complain.
customer_reviews.author: SandyPants

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: These are great warm weather active shoes for hiking, biking, going in water etc.. Hold up very well, can get wet, stay on.
customer_reviews.author: AmandaR

customer_reviews.title: ... two years and these ones live up to the amazing brand name
customer_reviews.text: We have used KEEN sandals for hiking for the past two years and these ones live up to the amazing brand name! I would recommend these sandals to anyone whose kids are in Summer Camp / daycare as it keeps their feet cool all while being closed toe!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Dempster

customer_reviews.title: ... needs shoes with arch support and her physical therapist recommended I buy these
customer_reviews.text: My daughter needs shoes with arch support and her physical therapist recommended I buy these. My daughter has gotten good use of these sandals this Summer. I will be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiS

customer_reviews.title: Sweet toddler shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes for my 2 1/2 year old daughter. They are super cute and perfect for playing. The style of the shoe seems to push her foot towards the back, which works, but she has small toes so there is a fair amount of room in the front. Her heel seemed uncomfortable in the smaller size. Since they are fabric, they have a few knicks, but not noticeable unless inspecting.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five year old fav!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter has been wearing this version and color of Keens since she could walk! It’s her standard summer shoe for all the rough and tumble things a five year old can get into! Awesome shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe and easy for my 4 year old to put on and off. Perfect for summer to run around, bike, and scooter.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen F.

customer_reviews.title: Prevents the dreaded the summertime "toe stump"
customer_reviews.text: While Chaco sandals are great for kids, these are even better. They give much better coverage to prevent injuries. It's an athletic shoe, it's a sandal, it's the best of both!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Peek

customer_reviews.title: These Shoes Wear Forever!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Keene for the grandkids since they were tiny. They wear them every single day that it is warm enough & since we live in West Texas, that is most of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Weimiemom

customer_reviews.title: Everything is perfect
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fits great, the colors are beautiful, the shipping was accurate. No issues. I'm a happy mom.
customer_reviews.author: MsKris

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: MY 5 YEAR OLD WORE THESE ALL SUMMER. No scuffs, rips, scratches or tares. These babies held Tough against the adventures of a 5 yr. old in summer campp. I am getting a pair for her every summer. I was so impressed at the durability! These are a must for young children!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for a day camp that my 6 y.o. is attending. Wanted something that she could wear all day and could get wet. She is probably closer to a 13.5 shoe size - so I ordered up to a 1. No problems- a little bit big, but as expected since I sized up a bit. I asked her specifically if they were falling off - she said no. She can tighten the strap. No blisters to report. Holding up fine after a week's wear at camp.
customer_reviews.author: JDAZ

customer_reviews.title: Love Keens
customer_reviews.text: You can not beat Keens for warmer weather at camps and playgrounds. My children love these shoes. They wear well and are very easy to clean in the dishwasher or clothes washer.
customer_reviews.author: Marla S.

customer_reviews.title: A Perfect Summer Gym Shoe/Sandal Hybrid
customer_reviews.text: Personally I don't like the look of these shoes, but the pure function of them are perfect for my very active 8 year old. They are breathable, waterproof and don't end up stinking to high heaven after a few sweaty days in the Chicago summer. That alone is worth the price tag and any aesthetics I don't like. Great shoe. Durable (this is our second pair of Keen's) and a perfect gym shoe alternative for summer!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole E Stack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, true to size, washable. My daughter loves them and says they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: chrissy

customer_reviews.title: We love Keens!
customer_reviews.text: We make sure my daughter always has a pair of Keens in her wardrobe. She has been wearing Keens since the age of about 3-4, she's 8 now. Nothing else last as long and she wears them more than any of her other shoes. During the winter, she just puts socks on with them.
customer_reviews.author: neveralone85

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, says they're comfortable and they're great for ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, says they're comfortable and they're great for the summer. They do take a long time to dry though, after getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old LOVES these shoes. They are very versatile and fit well. She says they are very comfortable and easy to get on and off. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: oksana

customer_reviews.title: Repeat purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is the third summer in a row that I’ve ordered these for my daughter. They hold up through field trips and being left outside in the rain. Quick to put on and she says they are comfy
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia M DeJonghe

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe for kids!
customer_reviews.text: I bought myself a pair of Keens and decided to add a pair for my daughter as well, since we will be walking extensively at Walt Disney World in a couple of weeks. She has already worn them to school one day and had absolutely no trouble with blisters or the need to "break in" the shoe. The cords can be loosened as necessary for a good fit. The color is great. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Bubblace

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe for my 8 year old daughter for the summer and to attend camps.
customer_reviews.author: Lillian .C Carlson

customer_reviews.title: multi colored  perfect match for  any casual outfit
customer_reviews.text: Yes, these rugged sandals are somewhat expensive. Yet they are made solid and easy to clean. Insoles are form fitting and the soles are made for playing, rough terrain etc.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Fits the needs of closed toes for school yet breaths like a sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R. Timm

customer_reviews.title: Second pair
customer_reviews.text: This is our second pair of these! So comfy and flexible! And the only pair of Keens on the narrower foot bed. These fit my kids perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: R.C.P.

customer_reviews.title: Keen sandals have always done well and these are no ...
customer_reviews.text: Keen sandals have always done well and these are no exception. We purchased the same sandal in a different color last year and these are exactly the same. Will continue to buy this style for my kids. Not too heavy and provides durable protection.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper in PA

customer_reviews.title: Nice Colors
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 6 year old daughter. They fit as expected and she loves the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Angela M. Sweat

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The comfort, color and wear are well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Gorgeous Georgeous

customer_reviews.title: LUV!
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoe I have ever worn! Everyone loves these!
customer_reviews.author: scent chick

customer_reviews.title: Other than that they are perfect! Love these shoes for summer
customer_reviews.text: The adjustment slider is too hard for my 6year old daughter to do by herself. I wish they had Velcro on top. I must have misunderstood the product description, as I thought the Little Kid sizes came with Velcro. Other than that they are perfect! Love these shoes for summer!
customer_reviews.author: Liahona1306

customer_reviews.title: she is able to wear it and decided she would keep it as everything else she loved about it
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a size 4 but they were definitely too big for my daughter, however, she is able to wear it and decided she would keep it as everything else she loved about it.
customer_reviews.author: honey2004

customer_reviews.title: Great in summer!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, comfortable, can even be worn with summer dresses!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne penny

customer_reviews.title: These are the perfect shoes for my almost 7 yr old for the ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect shoes for my almost 7 yr old for the summer. She wears these every day to her outdoor camp and is able to run, climb, trek in water, and go for nature hikes in comfort. Also, they're easy to get on and off but provide comfort and support all day. She's loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: The colors are brighter and even more attractive than in ...
customer_reviews.text: The colors are brighter and even more attractive than in the picture. The toes were covered so they were protected. The shoes will work very well for play on the playground until colder weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent summer shoe
customer_reviews.text: Excellent water and all around summer shoe for my 2.5 year old. I'll be getting another pair for next summer for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Mt Skeptic

customer_reviews.title: Love Keen brand !!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Keens I've purchased for my daughter. She is a rough & tumble chick and Keens never disapoint... these look pretty and hold up beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

product_meta.title: KEEN Whisper Toddler Hook-and-Loop Sandal (Toddler/Little Kid)
product_meta.description: Like leaves in the breeze, the Whisper speaks to you! Washable polyester webbing upper dries quickly when splashing about. Secure-fit Lace Capture System with added hook-and-loop strap over instep for an adjustable fit. Hydrophobic mesh lining helps prevent slippage. Non-marking, natural rubber outsole for added versatility. Measurements: Weight: 5 oz Product measurements were taken using size 9 Toddler, width M. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Features of this item include: Outdoor
